AECOM Salesforce - C1 Bid Notification ------------------------------------------------------------
{!Opportunity.Opportunity_ID__c} : {!Opportunity.Name} Invoicing Client: {!Opportunity.Account}
The purpose of this email is to notify you that an Opportunity with a Fee Value over $10Milion (C-1) or an Opportunity with a Bid Cost over $50K has been created. Opportunity number {!Opportunity.Opportunity_ID__c} , with Potential Fee Value of {!Opportunity.Amount}.
To view the details of this opportunity Click Here.
This email was generated: {!Opportunity.LastModifiedDate} by {!Opportunity.LastModifiedBy}. Please do not reply to this email. Contact the marketing manager in your region if there are any problems or issues.
